What is included

Mobile apps for passengers
Mobile apps for drivers
Web interface for passengers
Dispatcher panel
B2B interface
Admin panel for you and your team
1 / 6

Ordering web app

Web interface with the same functionality as the mobile app for a customer, that allows user to login and order a ride. Ability to create a new order, view rides history, edit personal details, manage credit cards, etc.

Marketing site

Marketing website or a simple landing page to promote your business and engage new customers. It may also contain the ordering widget, that allows users to order a ride in a few clicks and doesn’t require the registration.
